title: Aw khawiah nge Chhandamtu chuan
lyrics:
Aw, khawiah nge Chhandamtu chuan,
Lungngaih hrehawm a tuar?
A hmelduhawm tak hmuh ka chak,
Hmangaih thisen luanna.

Aw, i thisen luang ka hmuh chuan,
Ka sual kaidum a silfai ang;
Lungngaih mangan a bo tawh ang,
Aw, i thisenah chuan.

Aw, ka ngai che, Lalpa, tunah,
Ka sual tleng fai turin;
Khawvelah hian nangmah lo chu,
Faina dang a awm lo.

Ka hnukchah hun a lo thlenin,
Hmangaihin min hruai la,
Ka hlau lo vang thihna lui chu,
Himin ka lo kai ang.
